# Retargeting Docs

## Retargeting changes

- [.NET Framework 4.5](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.5.x.md): Find information about application compatibility issues that might affect your app when migrating to .NET Framework 4.5.x.
- [.NET Framework 4.6](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.6.x.md): Find information about application compatibility issues that might affect your app when migrating to .NET Framework 4.6.x.
- [.NET Framework 4.7](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7.x.md): Find information about application compatibility issues that might affect your app when migrating to .NET Framework 4.7.x.
- [.NET Framework 4.8](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.8.x.md): Find information about application compatibility issues that might affect your app when migrating to .NET Framework 4.8.x
